modmenu.summaryTranslation.make_bubbles_: Arrr matey, this here makes yer bubbles pop!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.make_bubb:
Arrr! This here client-side mod makes yer bubble particles pop an' lets them realistically rise to the water surface.
It also adds bubble particles to openin' chests, openin' barrels  an' explosions underwater.
